title: Gesture-Enhanced Advanced Grammar Rule Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Grammar Structure Comprehension and Upper-Intermediate Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: A language proficiency enhancement course for office/administrative professionals, applying differentiated gesture-based learning strategies to effectively acquire advanced grammar rules. Activity intensity is adjusted based on learners' language proficiency levels (e.g., TOEIC scores above/below 800).

learning_goals: Learners can identify complex grammar rules with over 85% accuracy under conditions using only animation without gestures.
Learners can distinguish and explain three or more gesture utilization strategies appropriate to their language proficiency level.
Learners can write a comparative analysis report on grammar learning effectiveness based on the integration of gestures in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
